snippet: The merger, formally announced on Wednesday, signals a renewed phase of jockeying among cellphone service providers as they race to draw in more smartphone users and upgrade to the latest high-speed data networks.
abstract: The merger, formally announced on Wednesday, signals a renewed phase of jockeying among cellphone service providers as they race to draw in more smartphone users and upgrade to the latest high-speed data networks.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: T-Mobile Deal for MetroPCS Adds Pressure on Sprint
headline.print_headline: T-Mobile to Acquire MetroPCS, Increasing Pressure on Sprint
